parameters.fetchXml:
<fetch version="1.0" output-format="xml-platform" mapping="logical" distinct="true">
  <entity name="ovs_registration">
    <attribute name="ovs_registrationid" />
    <attribute name="ovs_name" />
    <attribute name="ovs_registration_number_num" />
    <attribute name="ovs_expirydate" />
    <attribute name="ovs_organization_id"/>
     <link-entity name="account" from="accountid" to="ovs_organization_id" visible="false" link-type="outer" alias="Account">
      <attribute name="ovs_namefr" />
      <attribute name="name" />
      <attribute name="ovs_legalnamefr" />
      <attribute name="ovs_legalname" />
      <attribute name="emailaddress1" />
      <attribute name="address1_stateorprovince" />
      <attribute name="address1_postalcode" />
      <attribute name="address1_line3" />
      <attribute name="address1_line2" />
      <attribute name="address1_line1" />
      <attribute name="address1_country" />
      <attribute name="address1_city" />
    </link-entity>
     <link-entity name="ovs_submission" from="ovs_registration_id" to="ovs_registrationid" link-type="inner" alias="Submission">
<attribute name="ovs_name" />
        <filter type="and">
            <condition attribute="ovs_submissionid" operator="eq"  uitype="ovs_submission"  value="@{triggerOutputs()?['body/ovs_submissionid']}" />
        </filter>
      </link-entity>
     </entity>
 </fetch>

parameters.fetchXml:
<fetch version="1.0" output-format="xml-platform" mapping="logical" distinct="false">
  <entity name="ovs_organization_contact">
    <attribute name="ovs_organization_contactid" />
    <attribute name="ovs_role_id" />
    <attribute name="ovs_invitation_accepted_ind" />
    <attribute name="ovs_contact_id" />
    <attribute name="createdon" />
    <order attribute="createdon" descending="false" />
    <order attribute="ovs_role_id" descending="false" />
    <filter type="and">
      <condition attribute="ovs_organization_id" operator="eq" uitype="account" value="@{items('Apply_to_each')?['_ovs_organization_id_value']}" />
      <condition attribute="ovs_invitation_accepted_ind" operator="eq" value="1" />
    </filter>
    <link-entity name="ovs_organization_contact_role" from="ovs_organization_contact_roleid" to="ovs_role_id" visible="false" link-type="outer" alias="Role">
      <attribute name="ovs_name" />
    </link-entity>
    <link-entity name="contact" from="contactid" to="ovs_contact_id" link-type="inner" alias="Contact">
      <attribute name="lastname" />
      <attribute name="firstname" />
      <attribute name="fullname" />
      <attribute name="emailaddress1" />
      <attribute name="contactid" />
      <filter type="and">
        <condition attribute="ovs_mbun" operator="not-null" />
        <condition attribute="ovs_external_user_ind" operator="eq" value="1" />
      </filter>
    </link-entity>
  </entity>
</fetch>
